mapper.update: update ums_permission set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=BIT}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, parent_id, name, value, icon, type, url, status, create_time, sort from ums_permission
